Key Match Events: Angel di Maria scored the only goal for Argentina in the 40th minute.
Gonzalez scored in the 90+1 minute to secure the win for Argentina.
Caicedo received a yellow card in the 11th minute.
Gruezo received a yellow card in the 66th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Argentina will play the first of two Copa America warm-up matches against Ecuador in Chicago.
Argentina, the 2022 World Cup winners, are looking to claim a fourth consecutive victory.
Ecuador will try to return to winning ways after losing to Italy in their most recent outing in March.
